name: Project Zero: Origin
description:
BC 2049, the highly developed human civilization under invasion of vicious aliens. Humanity is imperiled.
Remnant human came together, pooling resources and throwing aside old rivalries for the sake of the greater good. To save the collapsing world, hence Project Zero was born.

[Key Features]
- Endless fun of collecting
Enormous roster of iconic Mercenaries are waiting for recruitment, train, awaken them to unlock numerous unique skills. Assemble your own formidable legion which is one of a kind.

- Time to embrace Brainstorm
Tactical gameplay brings you unexpected experience. Hundreds skills synergy crosses through whole combats, choose wisely and apply perfect formation to counter enemies, master battles and end the war!

- Build your base
We can’t march armies without strong base, do what you can to collect scarce resources and build necessary facilities.

- Take them down and retrieve the places we used to call Home
Are you prepare to embark the contaminated area? Those unknown places are saturated with vicious, filthy monsters and mutants. However tons of treasures and items hidden there alongside with invasion.

- With commanders cross the world
Tire of fighting alone? Forge a guild or join one, great chances to meet more players around the world. Recruit members and fight together, you will never be alone in this game.
